realistic art of a Vampire Countess, a regal and alluring figure with a heart-shaped face and high cheekbones. Her skin is pale and flawless, and her piercing green eyes are framed by long, dark lashes. The Vampire Countess wears a flowing gown of midnight blue, adorned with intricate lace and sparkling jewels. Her long, black hair cascades down her back in loose waves, by owlstudio.

realistic art of a Vampire Duke, a brooding and imposing figure with a strong jawline and chiseled features. His skin is a pale ivory, and his piercing blue eyes seem to see right through you. The Vampire Duke wears a black suit with a crisp white shirt, a red tie, and a matching pocket square. His jet-black hair is slicked back, and his expression is one of smug superiority, by owlstudio.

realistic art of a Vampire Priestess, a mysterious and otherworldly figure with a serene expression and an ethereal beauty. Her skin is a luminescent white, and her eyes are a deep, rich violet. The Vampire Priestess wears a flowing robe of deep crimson, adorned with gold embroidery and intricate patterns. Her long, silver hair is braided with delicate chains and adorned with shimmering jewels, by owlstudio.
